description: We plan to start converting the one-way road system back to two-way in 2020

texts: {"template":"intro","texts":["We are working closely with Lambeth Council to return the one-way road system at Vauxhall to two-way roads and improve the area for pedestrians and cyclists. We plan to start construction of the new road layout and bus station in 2021."],"link":{"image":{}},"image":{},"wrapped":false}
The proposed changes will help to improve connectivity and create a better environment for people living, working and travelling through Vauxhall.

{"template":"bulletlist","items":["Remove the existing one-way road system (Parry Street, Wandsworth Road, Kennington Way and South Lambeth Road) by converting these roads to two-way","Provide more cycle and pedestrian crossings as well as segregated lanes and parking for cyclists","Improve existing public spaces and provide new public spaces","Redesign the transport interchange, including a new central bus station, so that it works in a two-way arrangement"]}
Our planning application for the proposed bus station buildings and associated buildings was approved by Lambeth Council in February 2018.
We expect to start construction in 2021 and finish by 2024, subject to approvals.

{"template":"carousel","link":{"image":{}},"image":{},"carousel":[{"url":"https://tfl.gov.uk/cdn/static/cms/images/vauxhall-cross-street-railway-bridge.jpg","alt":"Artist's impression of proposals for  Kennington Lane and South Lambeth Road junction"},{"url":"https://tfl.gov.uk/cdn/static/cms/images/vauxhall-cross-railway-bridge.jpg","alt":"Artist's impression of proposals for South Lambeth Road and South Lambeth Place"},{"url":"https://tfl.gov.uk/cdn/static/cms/images/vauxhall-from-vauxhall-bridge.jpg","alt":"Vauxhall Cross - from Vauxhall Bridge"},{"url":"https://tfl.gov.uk/cdn/static/cms/images/vauxhall-cross-view-01-08.jpg","alt":"Artist's impression of proposals for Albert Embankment"},{"url":"https://tfl.gov.uk/cdn/static/cms/images/vauxhall-wandsworth-road.jpg","alt":"Wandsworth Road - looking north with new bus station on right"},{"url":"https://tfl.gov.uk/cdn/static/cms/images/vauxhall-bondway-looking-north.jpg","alt":"Bondway - looking north with new bus station on left"},{"url":"https://tfl.gov.uk/cdn/static/cms/images/vauxhall-square-daytime.jpg","alt":"The station square (daytime) from the rail station entrance"},{"url":"https://tfl.gov.uk/cdn/static/cms/images/vauxhall-square-night.jpg","alt":"The station square (night) from the rail station entrance"},{"url":"https://tfl.gov.uk/cdn/static/cms/images/vauxhall-bus-station-canopy.jpg","alt":"Bus station canopy - Bondway is on the right"}],"wrapped":false}
Our second consultation on detailed design proposals closed in January 2016. Our response to issues raised during the consultation can be found on the Vauxhall Cross consultation page .
